name: 4in Tibetan Thadobati
describe: The 4in Tibetan Thadobati singing bowl with it's beautiful tone and enchanting rhythm.  Originally acquired from bestsingingbowls.com. It's one of my favorite to add the higher tone to the compositions.

name: 5in Tibetan Jambati
describe: The 5in Tibetan Jambati singing bowl with it's unique tones adds a unique depth.  Originally acquired from tibetanprayerflag.com.

name: 6in Tibetan Jambati
describe: The 6in Tibetan Jambati singing bowl adds to the collection with it's long rhythmic tone.  Originally acquired from tibetanprayerflag.com.

name: 7in Crown Chakra Tibetan
describe: 7in B-Crown Chakra Old Tibetan Singing Bowl. Hand hammered Singing bowl from Nepal. Acquired from Amazon.com

name: 8in Tibetan Thadobati
describe: 8in Tibetan Thadobati singing bowl. Hand hammered singing bowl producing a long rhythmic sound that draws the listener in.  Originally acquired from Namaste in San Rafel, CA.

name: 9in Tibetan Hammered
describe: 9in Large Master Healing Hand hammered Tibetan Singing Bowl.  Originally acquired from Amazon.com

name: 9in Buddha Bowl
describe: 9in Large Tibetan Singing Bowl with engraving of the Buddha inside.  Originally acquired from Soul Connections in Mount Shasta, CA.

name: 9.5in Tibetan
describe: 9.5in Large Tibetan Thadobati Singing Bowl.  Originally acquired from Soul Connections in Mount Shasta, CA.

name: 9.5in Tibetan
describe: 9.5in Large Tibetan Thadobati Singing Bowl.  Originally acquired from Soul Connections in Mount Shasta, CA.
